TopicTitle: Why are posts monitored by moderators now?

Articles.Content:
Title says it all. I have been posting for a while, and both comments and threads themselves need moderator permission. Since I assume a mod will have to approve this, they will probably answer my question.

-EDIT- Only happens in Support and Development forums?
Yes, it only happens in support and dev forums for me.
I got it in the Post your pictures thread yesterday but I'm wondering if that's because I was posting a picture.
It seems to be triggering somewhat randomly at the moment from what Sal posted in the Forum Forum. All we know is that it's being looked into.
